availability.message: Open to freelance and co-op opportunities or just to chat

posts.title: Resume Refresh for 2026
posts.body: Just finished updating my resume with all the latest projects and experiences from the past year. Added some new technical details, reorganized things to better highlight what I've been working on, and made sure everything fits nicely on one page. If you're curious about what I've been up to or want to see the full picture, feel free to [take a look](/resume)â€”it's over on the resume page.

posts.title: My New Now Page!
posts.body: It's a new year, a new semester. With that, lots of other people have Now pages on their sites so now is as good a time as any to put one together myself as well as a bit of a design overhaul! Anyways, as I keep updating this I hope that you'll enjoy it and get to know me a little better.
